note.p: Death: Durham, North Carolina, USA (28 November 1938)
Career: Ex-Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Wilde Lecturer in Psychology, University of Oxford
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 39-62, plate, by Major Greenwood and May Smith
References: P Lovie and A D Lovie, 'Charles Edward Spearman, FRS (1863-1945)' in NR 1996 vol 50 pp 75-88
